item.description:
This is not an official meetup. If any body else would like to post convention announcements, please let me know.

Total Confusion XXI co-sponsored by GameTable Online and sponsored by Atlas Games. We are the largest premire multi-genre game convention. We are currently looking for enthusiastic game masters in role-playing, cards, mini's, board games and young player( event submission forms are available online). We are also interested in dedicated players who want to have fun!

This year we are launching a new live-action game where one of our ballrooms will be transformed into a city infested with zombies! Take turns collecting points, killing zombies or be killed!

www.totalcon.com

If meetup group members would like to meet at the convention, RSVP with where to meet at the date and time below or contact each other through the meetup group. Have fun!

Please note, there is an event fee from the convention. See the web site for details.

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Total Confusion XXI
